name: Pew Pew (billycombo) (billycombo)
description:
Aim: Jump around the platforms and shoot the evil squares to gain points, collect power-ups to help improve your chance of survival! 

Controls: Jump / Double Jump - Space, Right - D, Left - A, Shoot - Left Click 

This is the *highly* awaited squeal to  PewPew, featuring much more content, unlockables and things to do! It's completely free so why not try it out?

Secret Hints:

Level 1: Unnecessary. Level 2: Pillar. Level 3: Also pillar. Level 4: Getting hotter. Level 5: Second basement

Constructive criticism, bugs reports, etc are greatly appreciated. 

Thank you.
